_header: In vice most vicious he excels
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Aganis treason: Epitaphe for Donald Owre’ — eight 6-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
IN vyce most vitious he excellisThat with þe vyce of treasoun
                    mellis…
CULLl510.Last Lines: …ay rinnis þe foxquill he foott hais

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
In wyce most vicius he excellisThat with þe wyce off tresoune
                    mellis…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines: …Ay rynnes the foxquhille he fut hais
